001package xjtlu.cpt111.assignment.quiz.model;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.Collection;
006import java.util.List;
007
008import xjtlu.cpt111.assignment.quiz.lang.AppConstants;
009
010/**
011 * Model class for question
012 * 
013 * @author H.-P. Lam, Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University (XJTLU)
014 * @since 2024.09.10
015 * @since version 0.0.1
016 * @version Last modified: 2024.09.10
017 */
018public class Question implements AppConstants {
019
020        /**
021         * Create a new instance of a question with the information specified
022         * 
023         * @param topic             topic of the question
024         * @param difficulty        difficulty of the question
025         * @param questionStatement question statement
026         * @param options           an array of options
027         * 
028         * @return an instance of question with the information provided
029         */
030        public static final Question newInstance(String topic, Difficulty difficulty, String questionStatement,
031                        Option... options) {
032                return new Question(topic, difficulty, questionStatement, options);
033        }
034
035        /**
036         * Create a new instance of a question with the information specified
037         * 
038         * @param topic             topic of the question
039         * @param difficulty        difficulty of the question
040         * @param questionStatement question statement
041         * @param options           a collection of options
042         * 
043         * @return an instance of question with the information provided
044         */
045        public static final Question newInstance(String topic, Difficulty difficulty, String questionStatement,
046                        Collection<Option> options) {
047                return new Question(topic, difficulty, questionStatement, options);
048        }
049
050        /**
051         * Default difficulty of a question
052         */
053        public static final Difficulty DEFAULT_DIFFICULTY = Difficulty.EASY;
054
055        private Difficulty difficulty;
056
057        /**
058         * Topic of the question
059         */
060        private String topic;
061
062        /**
063         * The question statement
064         */
065        private String questionStatement;
066
067        /**
068         * The options available
069         */
070        private List<Option> options;
071
072        /**
073         * Error message after validity check
074         */
075        private String errorMessage;
076
077        /**
078         * Construct a question with the question string and options provided
079         * 
080         * @param topic             topic of the question
081         * @param questionStatement question statement
082         * @param options           an array of options
083         */
084        public Question(String topic, String questionStatement, Option... options) {
085                this(topic, DEFAULT_DIFFICULTY, questionStatement, Arrays.asList(options));
086        }
087
088        /**
089         * 
090         * Construct a question with the question string and options provided
091         * 
092         * @param topic             topic of the question
093         * @param questionStatement question statement
094         * @param options           a collection of options
095         */
096        public Question(String topic, String questionStatement, Collection<Option> options) {
097                this(topic, DEFAULT_DIFFICULTY, questionStatement, options);
098        }
099
100        /**
101         * 
102         * Construct a question with the question string and options provided
103         * 
104         * @param topic             topic of the question
105         * @param difficulty        difficulty of the question
106         * @param questionStatement question statement
107         * @param options           an array of options
108         */
109        public Question(String topic, Difficulty difficulty, String questionStatement, Option... options) {
110                __setup(topic, difficulty, questionStatement, Arrays.asList(options));
111        }
112
113        /**
114         * 
115         * Construct a question with the question string and options provided
116         * 
117         * @param topic             topic of the question
118         * @param difficulty        difficulty of the question
119         * @param questionStatement question statement
120         * @param options           a collection of options
121         */
122        public Question(String topic, Difficulty difficulty, String questionStatement, Collection<Option> options) {
123                __setup(topic, difficulty, questionStatement, options);
124        }
125
126        private void __setup(String topic, Difficulty difficulty, String questionStatement, Collection<Option> options) {
127                setTopic(topic);
128                setDifficulty(difficulty);
129                setQuestionStatement(questionStatement);
130                setOptions(options);
131        }
132
133        /**
134         * Return the topic of the question
135         * 
136         * @return topic of the question
137         */
138        public String getTopic() {
139                return topic;
140        }
141
142        /**
143         * Set the topic of the question
144         * 
145         * @param topic topic of the question
146         */
147        public void setTopic(String topic) {
148                if (null == topic || topic.isBlank())
149                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("topic cannot be null or empty!");
150                this.topic = topic;
151        }
152
153        /**
154         * Return the question statement
155         * 
156         * @return question
157         */
158        public String getQuestionStatement() {
159                return questionStatement;
160        }
161
162        /**
163         * Set the question string
164         * 
165         * @param questionStatement question string to be set
166         */
167        public void setQuestionStatement(String questionStatement) {
168                if (null == questionStatement || questionStatement.isBlank())
169                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Question statement is null or empty!");
170                this.questionStatement = questionStatement.strip();
171        }
172
173        /**
174         * Return the set of options available in the questions
175         * 
176         * @return set of options available
177         */
178        public Option[] getOptions() {
179                return options.toArray(new Option[0]);
180        }
181
182        /**
183         * Set options to the input set
184         * 
185         * @param options options set
186         */
187        public void setOptions(Collection<Option> options) {
188                if (null == options || options.isEmpty())
189                        return;
190                this.options = new ArrayList<>();
191                this.options.addAll(options);
192        }
193
194        /**
195         * Add a new option to the options set
196         * 
197         * @param option new option to be added
198         */
199        public void addOption(Option option) {
200                if (null == option)
201                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Option is null!");
202                if (null == options)
203                        options = new ArrayList<>();
204                options.add(option);
205        }
206
207        /**
208         * Return the difficulty of the question
209         * 
210         * @return difficulty of the question
211         */
212        public Difficulty getDifficulty() {
213                return difficulty;
214        }
215
216        /**
217         * Set the difficulty of the question
218         * 
219         * @param difficulty difficulty of the question
220         */
221        public void setDifficulty(Difficulty difficulty) {
222                this.difficulty = difficulty;
223        }
224
225        /**
226         * Check whether the current question contains all essential elements and with
227         * one and only one correct answer
228         * 
229         * @param throwException determine whether to throw an exception if there is any
230         *                       problem
231         * @return true if all conditions are satisfied; false otherwise
232         */
233        private boolean isValid(boolean throwException) {
234                errorMessage = null;
235                if (options.isEmpty()) {
236                        errorMessage = "No answer has been provided!";
237                } else if (options.size() == 1) {
238                        errorMessage = "Question should contains more than one answer!";
239                } else {
240                        int numOfAnswer = 0;
241                        for (Option option : options) {
242                                if (option.isCorrectAnswer())
243                                        numOfAnswer++;
244                        }
245                        if (numOfAnswer == 0) {
246                                errorMessage = "Question has NO correct answer!";
247                        } else if (numOfAnswer > 1) {
248                                errorMessage = "Question contains more than ONE correct answer!";
249                        }
250                }
251                if (null != errorMessage) {
252                        if (throwException)
253                                throw new RuntimeException(errorMessage);
254                        return false;
255                }
256                return true;
257        }
258
259        /**
260         * Check whether the current question contains all essential elements and with
261         * one and only one correct answer
262         * 
263         * @return true if all conditions are satisfied; false otherwise
264         */
265        private boolean isValid() {
266                return isValid(THROW_INVALID_EXCEPTION);
267        }
268
269        /**
270         * A string representation of the question
271         * 
272         * @param prefix prefix string to be added
273         * @param showErrorMessage determine whether to show error message
274         * @return String representation of the question
275         */
276        public String toString(String prefix, boolean showErrorMessage) {
277                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
278                if (!(null == prefix || prefix.isBlank()))
279                        sb.append(prefix.strip()).append(": ");
280                sb.append("[topic: \"").append(topic).append("\", difficulty: ").append(difficulty).append("] ");
281                sb.append("\n").append(QUESTION_OPTION_INDENTATOR).append("Question: ").append(questionStatement);
282                if (showErrorMessage && !isValid())
283                        sb.append(" [** " + errorMessage + " **]");
284                if (!(null == options || options.isEmpty())) {
285                        int optionNum = 0;
286                        for (Option option : options) {
287                                sb.append("\n").append(QUESTION_OPTION_INDENTATOR).append(option.toString("Option " + (++optionNum)));
288                        }
289                }
290                return sb.toString();
291        }
292
293        @Override
294        public String toString() {
295                return toString("", IS_DEBUG);
296        }
297}
